name: Russian Taxi Simulator 2016
description:
Do you like to transport people or drive cars? Then this game is for you!

Russian Taxi Simulator 2016 is one of the best taxi simulators, which offers you a unique gaming experience to feel like a real driver of Russian taxi. Realistic car physics and addictive gameplay await you! Try to become the best taxi driver in real Russian city!

Features:
- Realistic physics of taxi and other vehicles
- Unique taxi ordering system, deliver passengers from the entrance to the entrance!
- Excellent detailed realistic passengers/pedestrians with animations
- Intelligent Transport System of Traffic - a legends of Russian and Soviet car industry
- A realistic system of traffic lights and gas stations
- More than 13 well-detailed taxi cars!
- Detailed locations - Russian towns and villages!
- The cycles of day and night
- Radio with three radio stations - Rock, Pop and Rap
- Realistic damage system
- Full detailing of cabin and interior of cars
- Painting and tuning car
- Soft Control with the arrow keys, steering wheel or the accelerometer!
- Different types of cameras, including rear view camera and camera from salon
- Incredible 3D graphics
- Addictive gameplay!

Want to feel like a taxi driver? Then Russian Taxi simulator 2016 is your choice!
